attributes.action: Provide humanitarian aid to Mariupol through an air lift or use of drones
attributes.additional_details: Civilization cannot sit back and watch need of people left to starve through an unprovoked attack on their sovereign nation without providing aid.
attributes.background: Through either direct involvement or providing the necessary technology/resources to an NGO arrange for a "Berlin Air Lift" style support for the people of Mariupol, Ukraine. Notifying all sides of the flight path/air corridor before hand.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Urge UN to provide safe evacuation routes from war zone in Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610069

Help Ukrainian refugees and create a safe path for them to get to the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609574

Decisions about how any UK involvement in the evacuation of particular parts of Ukraine would be an operational matter for the armed forces.
